name: Extendify
author: Extendify

sections.description:
Extendify is the platform of site design and creation tools for people that want to build a beautiful WordPress website with a library of patterns and full page layouts for the Gutenberg block editor.

Make a beautiful WordPress website easier and faster than ever before with Extendify’s library of Gutenberg block patterns, templates, and page layouts for Gutenberg.

A library of Gutenberg block patterns, templates, and layouts

Our library of reusable website block patterns, templates, and full page layouts can be assembled to rapidly build beautiful websites or add to existing ones. These well-designed templates enable you to drag, drop and publish in WordPress, without a single line of code.

Core Gutenberg blocks

Get beautiful patterns and layouts without the added maintenance of third-party blocks or block collections, as our Gutenberg block patterns are made with core WordPress blocks whenever possible.

Built for your theme

Extendify is a theme-agnostic design experience platform that works with your Gutenberg-friendly WordPress theme or Block Theme ‚Äî instantly leveling-up your editing and publishing flow today. If you change your theme, colors, typography, or any other element, your Extendify Gutenberg block patterns and full page layouts will adapt to the new design.

Site Types

Extendify has tons of Gutenberg block patterns for all sorts of site types. Whether you‚Äôre publishing a site for a yoga studio, restaurant, dentist, or lawyer, select your site type in the library and see a curated selection of Gutenberg block patterns and full page layouts ‚Äî with industry-specific images and copy.

Block Pattern Types

Choose from Gutenberg block pattern types for every part of your website, including:

  • About page patterns
  • Call to action patterns
  • Feature patterns
  • Gallery patterns
  • Headline patterns
  • Hero patterns
  • Team patterns
  • Text patterns

Layouts

Layouts are a full collection of Gutenberg block patterns that are put together in effective and compelling page templates. By selecting the ‚ÄúLayouts‚Äù tab at the top of the library, you‚Äôll see the beautiful full page templates that you can then add to your site.

Free Imports

Users gets 10 free imports per site each calendar month. Free imports can be used with base Gutenberg block patterns, templates, and layouts. You can publish and use these elements on your site without a subscription to Extendify.

Like Extendify?

  • Follow us on Twitter.
  • Rate us on WordPress üôÇ

Privacy

Extendify is a SaaS (software as a service) connector plugin that uses a custom API to fetch block patterns and page layouts from our servers. API requests are only made when a user clicks on the Library button. In order to provide and improve this service, Extendify passes site data along with an API request, including:

  • Browser
  • Referring site
  • Category selection
  • WP language
  • WP version
  • Active theme
  • Active plugins
  • Anonymized UUID
  • Anonymized IP address

By activating the Extendify plugin and accessing the library, you agree to our privacy policy and terms of service.
sections.installation:
1. Install using the WordPress plugin installer, or extract the zip file and drop the contents into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress site.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Edit or create a new page on your site
  4. Press the ‘Library’ button at the top left of the editor header
  5. Browse and import beautiful patterns and full page layouts; click one to add it directly to the page.

For documentation and tutorials, read our guides.
sections.faq:
Can I use Extendify with any theme?

Yes! You can create a beautiful site in just a few clicks with just about any Gutenberg-friendly WordPress theme.

Can I use Extendify with WooCommerce?

Yes! Extendify is compatible with WooCommerce. You‚Äôll need to install and configure WooCommerce separately to set up eCommerce functionality.

Is Extendify free?

Extendify is a free plugin available through the WordPress.org directory that allows users to extend the power of the Gutenberg Block Editor. Each user receives a limited number of imports completely free. Select hosting partners offer unlimited access to their customers.

Will Extendify slow down my website?

Nope! Extendify imports lightweight block-based content that is served directly from your WordPress site. Our templates use the latest WordPress technologies, leveraging the best that Gutenberg has to offer, without any of the bloat of traditional page builders.

1.11.2 – 2023-11-27

1.11.1 – 2023-11-14

1.11.0 – 2023-11-10

  • Self hosting translation files within the plugin

1.10.1 – 2023-10-20

  • Added better library support for non-block themes
  • Various bug fixes and improvements

1.10.0 – 2023-10-10

  • Design Library rebuilt from the ground up
  • Various bug fixes and improvements

1.9.3 – 2023-09-28

  • Fixes a compatibility issue with WooCommerce product images

1.9.2 – 2023-09-07

  • Fixes a bug where translations wouldn’t load after an update
  • Fixes a bug where scripts loaded twice on the upgrade page (in the iframe)

1.9.1 – 2023-09-06

  • Fixes a bug where the input focus would happen too soon
  • Adds various UI enhancements

1.9.0 – 2023-08-31

  • Updates Launch flow and design
  • Various bug fixes and improvements

1.8.2 – 2023-08-17

  • Fixes an issue with some translations not showing
  • Fixes an issue where translated text would not wrap to the next line

1.8.1 – 2023-08-10

  • Removed settings to show/not show the Library button
  • Fixes a bug where the library button occasionally wouldn’t show up for some users
  • Fixes a bug where we’d mark the db as having imported a template before imported

1.8.0 – 2023-08-03

  • Fixes an issue with the logo preview not showing
  • Adds overall performance improvements specific to data loading
  • Adds 6.3 compatibility fixes and tweaks

1.7.0 – 2023-06-16

  • Added php 8.2 compatibility
  • Fixes an issue where loading translations too early would conflict with mailer type plugins
  • Fixed various translation issues

1.6.3 – 2023-05-17

  • Fixes an issue with navigation type blocks missing the outer wrapper
  • Fixes an issue where some css styles were being stripped for some users
  • Tweaked the loading of some buttons for better visual consistency

1.6.2 – 2023-05-16

  • Fixes a nav block inserter bug for non-English languages
  • Various performance and error handling improvements
  • Adds ability to insert css utility classes to current theme when deactivating

1.6.1 – 2023-05-04

  • Fixes an optimistic update bug that caused a loading error

1.6.0 – 2023-05-04

  • Updated tour progression checking
  • Fix translation loading
  • Various bug fixes and improvements
  • Deprecation notice: In the next release we will be removing a majority of unused utility classes from the frontend stylesheet. This is to reduce the frontend stylesheet filesize and improve page speed. These classes were not included in any of our patterns, but may have been manually used by some users. If you are using these classes and need assistance in migrating these unused styles, please reach out to us at support@extendify.com

short_description: The best WordPress templates, pattern, and layout library with 1,000+ designs built for the Gutenberg block editor.
